typeDescriptions.typeString: struct CreatureFactory.Creature storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev Constructs a creature based on an array of mana. It creates the features of
 the creature based on the types of mana used.

documentation.text: @dev A getter function for creature info.

devdoc.details: Creatures are one of the main spells that a plainswalker can cast. Right now I want each creature to be connected to the plainswalker that summoned it. Not a tradeable asset (it stays with the plainswalker it it is traded though).

getCreatureInfoByIndex(uint256).details: A getter function for creature info.
